TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NSCopying_Extensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension class for the Objective-C NSCopying protocol.
Docs.remarks: This class contains only a single method, the optional Copy method from the NSCopying protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoTouch.Foundation.NSObject Copy (this MonoTouch.Foundation.INSCopying This, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSZone zone);
.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSObject Copy(class MonoTouch.Foundation.INSCopying This, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSZone zone) cil managed

Docs.param: Zone to use to allocate this object, or null to use the default zone.
Docs.summary: Performs a copy of the underlying Objective-C object.
Docs.returns: A new instance with a copy of the underlying object.

remarks.para: This method performs a copy of the underlying Objective-C object state. It does not actually try to replicate any managed state.
